title: Exploring Japan: Art, Photography and Shopping

spans.spanDescription: Discover the vibrant city of Tokyo, its art, shopping destinations and photography spots

activities.name: Tokyo National Museum
activities.description: Visit Japan's oldest and largest art museum

activities.name: Akihabara Shopping District
activities.description: Explore the vibrant shopping district known for its electronics retailers, anime and manga

activities.name: Shibuya Crossing Photography
activities.description: Capture the world's busiest pedestrian crossing

activities.name: Shibuya 109 Shopping Mall
activities.description: Visit the iconic shopping mall known for its fashion stores and boutiques

spans.notes: Remember to try the local cuisine and take plenty of photos of the vibrant city life.

spans.spanDescription: Discover the historic city of Kyoto, its art, shopping destinations and photography spots

activities.name: Kyoto National Museum
activities.description: Explore the art and culture of Japan at one of the country's oldest and most distinguished museums

activities.name: Nishiki Market Shopping
activities.description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of Kyoto's largest traditional food market

activities.name: Fushimi Inari Shrine Photography
activities.description: Capture the beautiful and iconic red torii gates at the Fushimi Inari Shrine

activities.name: Kyoto Handicraft Center Shopping
activities.description: Shop for traditional Japanese crafts and souvenirs

spans.notes: Don't forget to enjoy the traditional tea ceremony and the local cuisine.

spans.spanTitle: Return to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

activities.name: Kiyomizu-dera Temple
activities.description: Visit the historic and iconic Kiyomizu-dera Temple

activities.name: Kiyomizu-dera Shopping Street
activities.description: Explore the shopping street leading to Kiyomizu-dera Temple for last minute souvenirs

spans.notes: Check all belongings before leaving the hotel and arrive at the airport 2 hours before the flight.
